com.example.myJoyStick

Class DualJoystickView

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinearLayout
      • com.example.myJoyStick.DualJoystickView

  • public class DualJoystickView
extends LinearLayout
    DualJoystickView is a class that implements us a linear layout with two joystick view.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    v5.0
    Author:
    Shmulik Melamed, Lital Motola

        public void setAutoReturnToCenter(boolean left,
                         boolean right)
        Added in API level 1 Called when we want to return the left and right joystick to the center automatically.
        Parameters:
        left - joystick true if already in center and false if not.
        right - joystick true if already in center and false if not.
        Since:
        1.0

        Parameters:

        1.0

      • dispatchTouchEvent

        public boolean dispatchTouchEvent(MotionEvent ev)
        Added in API level 1 Pass the touch screen motion event down to the target view, or this view if it is the target.
        Parameters:
        ev - The motion event to be dispatched.
        Returns:
        True if the event was handled by the view, false otherwise.
        Since:
        1.0

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent ev)
        Added in API level 1 Implement this method to handle touch screen motion events.
        Parameters:
        ev - The motion event.
        Returns:
        True if the event was handled, false otherwise.
        Since:
        1.0
